title: One month FREE!  Newer Construction ~ Huge Kitchen ~ Waived app&adm
posting_body: Basic qualifying criteria:   Must have a social security number and valid ID.
Income to exceed 3x the rental amount monthly (gross pay).
This is verified with pay stubs.
Cash income can not be used to qualify.
Apartment community checks credit, rental, and criminal background.
Credit does not have to be perfect, but property will not work with past broken leases, evictions, or any landlord debt.
Waived on Look and Lease Special
Letter required by Certified Veterinarian for proof of breed, weight, and required vaccinations
